roleset.name: block someone's actions
roleset.note: STYMIE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. No VNcls. (from stymie.01-v)

example.name: active
example.text: But while U.S. interest may be big and growing, the difficulties that-1 [*T*-1] have stymied deals in the past show no sign of abating.

example.name: passive
example.text: Knowledgeable employees said [the project]-1 had been stymied [*-1]somewhat by ``the difficulty of designing'' the jackets.
example.arg: by the difficulty of designing the jackets
